articles.title: Galaxy AI: Unleashing User Creativity on Galaxy S Ultra
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced Galaxy AI, a new AI platform designed to enhance creativity on mobile devices. The technology features improved Sketch to Image functionality with Drawing Assist and multimodal input, which allows users to generate images using text or voice commands. Galaxy AI will be integrated into the Galaxy S Ultra series and One UI 7.

articles.title: Researching Competitors in New Markets
articles.author: Graphics Tech
articles.summary: Spaw.co introduces its 4G mobile proxy as the best solution for competitor research, masking IP addresses and mimicking real user activity to avoid detection while gathering data.

articles.title: A review of the two new ice blocks vying for the Cyclone's crown
articles.author: Madeleine Chapman
articles.summary: Tip Top introduced the 'Popsicle Fruit Stack', a sorbet-like ice block, featuring strawberry and orange flavors with chocolate shavings. Streets launched the 'Twister Monstaahh', an apple, blueberry, and lemon flavored ice block, promoting its use of real fruit and no artificial colors. The article compares these new products to the existing 'Cyclone' ice block.

articles.title: When the new Mazda CX-5 will debut
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Mazda is preparing to unveil the next generation of its popular mid-sized SUV, the CX-5.

articles.title: Sensori.Ai's "Triumph": AI-Crafted Fragrance from Trump Speeches
articles.author: Vijay A
articles.summary: Sensori.Ai has launched a new fragrance called "Triumph," crafted from the essence of President Trump's public speeches. The fragrance utilizes proprietary NeuroAi technology, merging neuroscience with Generative AI to create a scent designed to evoke emotional responses. "Triumph" will serve as a demonstration of NeuroAi technology's potential applications.

articles.title: Adjust Vapes: Customize Your Flavor Experience
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: Adjust has launched two new single-use vapes, mysweet and mysour, offering customizable flavor experiences with adjustable sweetness and sourness levels. These vapes feature six unique flavors, adjustable intensity, a tri-level switch for different vaping modes, and an interactive side screen.

articles.title: The incredible benefits of the black snail ampoule everyone is talking about
articles.summary: Dr.G, a Korean skincare brand, offers products like the Green Mild Up Sun+ Sunscreen with SPF 50+ PA++++, Brightening Peeling Gel for gentle exfoliation, and Filagrin Barrier Balm for hydration. The Red Blemish Clear Soothing Cream is popular for acne and irritation, while the Royal Black Snail Ampoule, containing 63% black snail mucin, bee honey, and niacinamide, is being introduced for dry and mature skin, promising intense hydration.

articles.title: The Galaxy S25 Countdown Begins: What to Expect During the Samsung Unpacked Event and How to Watch
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its Galaxy S25 lineup, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra, during its Unpacked event on January 22nd. The new phones are expected to have a rounded design and be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 processor, with potential Qi2 wireless charging support. The event will also feature expansions and updates for Galaxy AI.

articles.title: Best Buy's MLK Sale Has Dropped My Favorite Cordless Vacuum by $200
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: The Dyson V15 cordless vacuum cleaner helps clean up messes faster and more conveniently. It works great for quick clean-ups or deep cleans. It is now down by $200 at Best Buy as part of MLK Day.

articles.title: Wonderful enters CX agency era
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Wonderful, founded in 2022, is expanding into a full-service customer experience (CX) agency, integrating technology, data, creativity, and performance. This includes services such as brand and performance marketing, experience design, and technology implementation, leveraging AI tools to create personalized and scalable experiences. The goal is to provide end-to-end solutions, from brand awareness to conversion.

articles.title: 'I used £30 Amazon window vacuum to get rid of condensation in seconds'
articles.author: Branwen Jones
articles.summary: Beldray BEL0749 Cordless Window Vac launched on Amazon and Argos is receiving high praise for its effectiveness in eliminating condensation and providing a streak-free finish, with customers reporting ease of use and excellent cleaning results on windows, mirrors, and shower screens. The product is compared to the Karcher WV 5 Plus and Tower TWV10 Cordless Handheld Window Vacuum Cleaner, and is available for £30.

articles.title: Aldi's Dyson hairdryer dupe returns to stores this month with 4 limited-edition colours – & it's only £14.99
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Ionic Hairdryer on January 26th with new limited-edition color options for £14.99. The hairdryer features concentrator and diffuser attachments, multiple heat and speed settings, cool shot functionality, and overheat protection. It is being marketed as an affordable alternative to the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hairdryer.

articles.title: Aldi's Dyson hairdryer dupe returns to stores this month with 4 limited-edition colours – & it's only £14.99
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Ionic Hairdryer on January 26th with new limited-edition colors, priced at £14.99. This hairdryer is considered a dupe for the Dyson hairdryer and boasts features like concentrator and diffuser attachments, multiple heat and speed settings, and cool shot functionality. Aldi is known for beauty dupes, including skincare and makeup products often rivalling high-end brands.

articles.title: Aldi's Dyson hairdryer dupe returns to stores this month with 4 limited-edition colours – & it's only £14.99
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Ionic Hairdryer on January 26th in stores. The hairdryer, priced at £14.99, will be available in four limited-edition two-toned colors and features concentrator and diffuser attachments, multiple heat options, and cool shot functionality.

articles.title: Why Mobile-First Experiences Are the Future of Digital Interaction
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: Palisades Tahoe revolutionized the mountain experience with mobile apps providing real-time snow conditions and lift wait times. Restaurants and retail shops in Kings Beach and Tahoe City are increasingly relying on mobile ordering systems to manage seasonal rushes and enhance customer convenience. Mobile apps now help coordinate everything from snow removal services in Truckee to boat rentals in Incline Village.

articles.title: The iPhone trick that goes viral that helps you do laundry
articles.summary: Apple has updated its iOS 17 on iPhones, enhancing the Visual Look Up feature. This update allows iPhone users to decode laundry care symbols by taking a photo of the label, providing easy access to laundry instructions and improving the device's utility.

articles.title: Lava Agni 3 review: Design meets functionality
articles.author: Arghanshu Bose
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Agni 3 smartphone, featuring a unique design with a secondary 'InstaScreen' on the back. The phone boasts a MediaTek Dimensity 7300X chipset, a 50MP primary camera, a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and a 5,000mAh battery with 66W fast charging. It runs on a clean, bloatware-free Android 14 and is priced competitively at Rs 20,999.

articles.title: Amazon axing popular perk for Prime members – there's just days left to use it before it's ‘back to old-fashioned way'
articles.author: Jacob Willeford
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its "Try Before You Buy" service for Prime members on January 31, 2025, due to the increasing use of new AI-powered features such as virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations. The service allowed members to test clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. Amazon is focusing on these AI-driven technologies to enhance the customer experience.

articles.title: Bose Launches Its Ultra Open Earbuds in Four New Spring-Ready Colorways
articles.summary: Bose has introduced four new colorways for its Ultra Open Earbuds, which were initially released in February of the previous year. These open earbuds offer an alternative to traditional in-ear models, providing a natural 'transparency mode' by clipping onto the ears instead of sitting inside the ear canal.

articles.title: HMD Skyline 5G smartphone launched at Safari Mall event
articles.summary: Human Mobile Devices (HMD) has launched the HMD Skyline 5G smartphone in Qatar, priced at QR 1,499. The phone features a 108MP Triple Main Camera, a 50MP telephoto lens, and a 13MP ultrawide lens, along with a 50MP AI Selfie Shooter. It is made from recycled aluminum and boasts features like Digital Detox Mode and Qi2 magnetic wireless charging.

articles.title: Porsche Design and Honor Announce the Magic7 RSR
articles.summary: Honor, in collaboration with Porsche Design, is launching the PORSCHE DESIGN HONOR Magic7 RSR, an ultra-premium remix of the Honor Magic7 Pro smartphone. The new smartphone incorporates design elements from Porsche's Taycan Turbo S and is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite Mobile Platform, running on Honor's MagicOS 9.0 operating system.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans go wild over Dyson dupe for less than €50, and €250 cheaper than original
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner on January 23 for €49.99. This vacuum cleaner is designed as a more affordable alternative to the Dyson V8 advanced vacuum. Aldi Ireland also released the Visage 5-in-1 Hair Styler for €69.00, a dupe of the Dyson Airwrap, featuring multiple attachments and settings.

articles.title: Donald Trump inauguration: What will happen at the inaugural balls, will the new President and Melania dance? Here's everything you need to know
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Inara Marketers offers Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands. elearnmarkets provides Financial Education via StockEdge through their A2Z of Money program. NSP Strategy Facilitation Ltd. introduces a Succession Planning Masterclass led by Nigel Penny, and several online courses are offered by individuals like Metla Sudha Sekhar, Sachenkumar Rai, Seth Godin, Pam Moore, CA Rahul Gupta, Shraddha Somani, Tanusree De.

articles.title: The €6.99 Aldi Ireland buy that will get your home ‘clean and tidy' while saving you time with handy electronic features
articles.author: Jodie McCormack
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching the Electric Scrubber for €6.99 and the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner for €49.99. The Electric Scrubber features interchangeable heads and comes in three colors, while the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner has a 20-minute performance, LED display, and a 650ml dust container capacity.

articles.title: Liquid lip balms are taking over in 2025
articles.summary: Get Ready With Me Cosmetics (GRWM) is launching a new liquid lip balm called Lip Maxx, available in stores and online starting January 14, 2025. Lip Maxx is designed as a multitasking product offering hydration, gloss, and vibrant color, catering to the trend of "anghulu lips" and "Korean glossy lips."

articles.title: Shoppers rush to snag Nutribullet blender down to less than £15 with deal stack tactic
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: The Nutribullet portable blender is now available at Yimbly with a discount, and a deal via TopCashback allows new members to purchase it for a lower price. Ninja launched their Blast Cordless Portable Blender last year for £49.99.

articles.title: Shoppers rush to snag Nutribullet blender down to less than £15 with deal stack tactic
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Nutribullet is offering its portable blender with a 25% discount, making it available for as low as £14.74 through deals with websites like Yimbly and TopCashback. The portable blender is known for its cordless design, compact size, 2000mAh battery offering 15 blending cycles, and 100W motor capable of blending frozen fruit and ice.

articles.title: Aldi's viral £14.99 hair dryer is back – and it looks just like the Dyson supersonic
articles.author: Lois Borny
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Visage ionic hairdryer in 2025, an affordable alternative to the Dyson supersonic hair dryer, priced at £14.99. The Visage ionic hairdryer features three heat settings, two-speed settings, a cool shot button, a concentrator, and a diffuser and will be available in four colors: mint green and coral, black and gold, purple and coral, or pink and mint green, in stores from January 26th.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers race to snap up £120 alternative to Dyson and Shark vacuum cleaners
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Powerffy introduced the Powerffy Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, a budget-friendly alternative to high-end brands priced at £119.99. This vacuum features a 2200mAh battery providing 45 minutes of runtime, dynamic rotation, LED headlights, and up to 30Kpa suction power, challenging pricier alternatives like the Shark Classic Anti Hair Wrap Upright Pet Vacuum.

articles.title: Before you continue to YouTube
articles.summary: Google utilizes cookies and data to develop and improve new services. They also personalize content and advertisements based on user settings, past activity, and location, tailoring the user experience.

articles.title: Honda Amaze introductory price extension: Get the sedan at introductory prices till January 31, 2025
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Honda launched the 4th generation of the Honda Amaze in December 2024, with an introductory starting price of Rs 8 lakh. The introductory prices have been extended till January 31, 2025. The Honda Amaze is offered in three variants: V, VX, and ZX and comes with both manual and CVT options.

articles.title: Progresso introduces Soup Drops to enjoy your favorite soup on the go
articles.author: Joy Saha
articles.summary: Progresso, a brand under General Mills, has announced the launch of Soup Drops, a new soup candy product line. These candies are designed to deliver the iconic flavors of Progresso's existing soup offerings in a convenient, cough-drop-like format.

articles.title: Samsung Teases New Way To Interact With Mobile Through Hologram Experience Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Od Admin
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched a live hologram showcase in London to preview the next era of Galaxy AI mobile experiences. The projections displayed images representing user-captured memories, hinting at intuitive mobile experiences and new features set to arrive with the next Galaxy S series lineup.

articles.title: Big Hook Media Unveils New Book ‘Brand Like A Girl'
articles.summary: Big Hook Media Inc. has released "Brand Like A Girl, Setting the Stage for SUCCESS" by Julie M Adams. The book explores branding and gender dynamics, providing strategies for building inclusive brands. It is available in paperback and ebook formats.

articles.title: Ellsworth Creamery Launches New Logo and Comprehensive Rebranding Initiative
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Ellsworth Creamery, a dairy company, is launching a comprehensive rebranding initiative. This initiative includes a modernized logo, redesigned product packaging with vibrant visuals and clear labeling, and a refreshed website to enhance the customer experience. The company aims to strengthen its market position and explore growth opportunities across the U.S.

articles.title: Samsung Projects Holographic Display in London Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Faizan Farooque
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics previewed innovations expected at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event with holographic projections in London, showcasing features meant to premiere with the next Galaxy S series range and Galaxy AI technology. These projections, displayed 100 feet above ground, highlight Samsung's objectives of improving user interaction with mobile devices through artificial intelligence, with more details to be revealed at the Jan. 22 event.

articles.title: I went to the Alps to test Honor's AI Super Zoom camera and the results are both fascinating and frightening
articles.author: Axel Metz
articles.summary: Honor has introduced 'AI Super Zoom,' a cloud-based feature in their Magic 7 Pro smartphone, designed to enhance distant landscape photography by using generative AI to fill in details at 30x digital zoom. This optional tool aims to provide 'crystal-clear images' of distant scenes, offering a blend of image enhancement and artificial detail creation.

articles.title: All Eyes on Ergode: Inside the Bold Rebrand Turning Heads
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Ergode has launched a new brand identity featuring a redesigned logo and revamped corporate website. The new logo symbolizes growth and innovation, while the website offers a modern user experience. This rebranding reflects Ergode's commitment to global growth and innovation in e-commerce.

articles.title: Oppo's next foldable is about as thin as USB-C allows
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Oppo is preparing to launch its Find N5 foldable phone, which is remarkably thin when unfolded. The Find N5, expected to be rebranded as the OnePlus Open 2 in the US, will also offer high resistance to water.

articles.title: South Asia's F&B leaders unite: inside Tetra Pak's visionary leadership event
articles.author: ET Spotlight
articles.summary: Tetra Pak South Asia customer event showcased the company's new advancements in food processing and packaging. This included innovations like Tetra Pak® E3 Speed/Hyper, the fastest filling machine for carton packages and Tetra Pak® Robot Filler, a semi-automated unit for filling up to 12-litre ice cream tubs. Furthermore, fermented de-sugared juice lines and high-protein dairy solutions were presented to cater to active lifestyles.

articles.title: Ashish Kumar: Bridging innovation and customer success with data-driven strategies
articles.author: Suhas Sistu
articles.summary: Rossari Biotech Limited launched new fragrance products, specifically lavender oil polymer microcapsules, under the leadership of Ashish Kumar. These products achieved sales of 100-120 units within the first year. The successful product launch highlighted Ashish's ability to manage complex technical challenges and communicate with stakeholders.

articles.title: Soup Drops: Candy with Chicken Soup Flavor
articles.author: Tony Hart Tony Hart Published:
articles.summary: General Mills, through its Progresso brand, has launched a new product called Soup Drops, chicken soup-flavored candies. These limited-edition candies are sold in a soup can container and are available for purchase on Thursdays throughout January at ProgressoSoupDrops.com.

articles.title: Tachyon Technologies Inaugurates Global Delivery Centre in Hyderabad
articles.author: DC Correspondent
articles.summary: Tachyon Technologies has launched its Global Delivery Centre in Hyderabad, aiming to provide world-class IT solutions. The company plans to hire 500 professionals to enhance expertise in areas like SAP, Sales Force, AI, software testing and Data Analytics. This center supports Tachyon's goal of achieving $1 billion in revenue.

articles.title: How to use xAI's Grok web version: Key features, eligibility explained
articles.author: Shaurya Sharma
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) has launched a standalone web version of its AI chatbot, Grok, making it available to free users.  Users can access Grok through grok.com without needing an X account and can generate both text and images. The web experience includes various modes like Auto, Visualise, Search, and Model-Only.

articles.title: Zalando places public tender offer for About You
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Zalando launched a public tender offer for About You after receiving approval from the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority BaFin. The acceptance period started on January 20 and is expected to end on February 17. Zalando is offering 6.50 euros ($6.71) per share in cash for the acquisition.

articles.title: TVS King EV MAX, a connected electric three-wheeler, launched at ₹2,95,000
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: TVS Motor Company launched the TVS King EV MAX, an electric three-wheeler, on January 20. The vehicle features a 179 km range, a 6-year/150,000 km warranty, and TVS SmartXonnect™ capabilities, available at a price of ₹2,95,000 (ex-showroom).

articles.title: Bluesky and X launch new video feeds amid TikTok uncertainties
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Bluesky launched a new video feed. X also launched a new video feed.

articles.title: ODL Unveils Expanded Product Lines, Showcasing at the International Builders' Show 2025
articles.author: ODL
articles.summary: ODL, Inc. has expanded its key product lines of door solutions. The additions are designed to provide dealers, distributors, builders, and homeowners with more options for creating welcoming spaces.

articles.title: Tired of waiting? Swiggy's live chat saves the day
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched a live chat support feature on Android to provide real-time assistance with order-related issues, such as late deliveries and order status inquiries. This service aims to revolutionize customer service by offering hassle-free support.

articles.title: This 'luxurious' hyaluronic acid cream sells one every two minutes - here's why
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Sculpted by Aimee introduced CloudCream, a hydrating skincare product, reporting a unit sale every two minutes and positive user feedback. Clinique has their Moisture Surge Cream, which is oil-free and rehydrating. Glow Recipe offers Plum Plump Hyaluronic Cream, utilizing plum extract and hyaluronic acid for supple skin.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Date, Time, How to Watch Live, S25 Ultra Features, and More
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22, featuring the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra models. The S25 series will include advancements like the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, improved camera systems (up to a 200MP main camera on the Ultra), 120Hz Dynamic 2X AMOLED displays, and will run on One UI 7 based on Android 15. The event may also preview other products like the Galaxy Ring 2 and Galaxy S25 Slim.

articles.title: The Best Washing Machines to Get Under ₦150,000
articles.summary: The article highlights several affordable washing machines available in the market, including the Technocool 5kg Top Loader Twin Tub Washing Machine, World Elite 5.5kg Washing Machine, Bruhm 4.5kg Mini Washing Machine, Boscon 6.8kg Single Tub, Polystar PV-WD4.5K (4.5kg) Top Loader Single Tub Washing Machine, and Skyrun 6kg Single Tub Washing Machine. Each model offers unique features such as energy-saving capabilities, quick wash cycles, overload protection, and compact designs, catering to various consumer needs and budgets.

articles.title: Oppo's upcoming foldable phone is as slim as possible with USB-C connectivity.
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Oppo is preparing to release the Find N5 foldable phone, noted for its incredibly thin design. The device may be launched in the US under the OnePlus Open 2 brand. The phone features high-end water resistance.

articles.title: Review: Defi Beauty's 'Blend Buddy' makeup blender
articles.summary: Defi Beauty launched its "Blend Buddy" makeup blender, priced at ₹450. The blender is designed for versatile makeup applications, promising a smooth, airbrushed finish. While it has a soft texture and is easy to use and store, it tends to absorb a lot of product.

articles.title: I bought a robot vacuum cleaner at a party. It has changed my life
articles.author: Sam Dimmer
articles.summary: The Lubluelu Robot Vacuum Cleaner, priced at £137, is reviewed after purchase by the author. The author praises its cleaning effectiveness, ease of use via the app, and mopping capabilities. Though not perfect, the author considers it a worthwhile purchase, but customer reviews vary.

articles.title: Innovation in Customer Success and Technology: A Conversation with Ashish Kumar
articles.summary: At Rossari Biotech, Ashish Kumar led a team that developed and launched lavender oil polymer microcapsules. This product launch resulted in sales of 100-120 units in the first year.

articles.title: How to Watch the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked Event on Wednesday
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Samsung is unveiling its new phones for 2025 at its Galaxy Unpacked event on Wednesday, January 22. This event marks the launch of Samsung's latest mobile products.

articles.title: Samsung's new subscription service offers 50% refund on used phones
articles.author: 공탈출 행정학
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. is launching the 'New Galaxy AI Subscription Club' on Friday, which offers up to a 50% refund on used Galaxy smartphones. This service targets mobile virtual network operators (MVNO) users and allows subscribers to return their smartphones after 12 or 24 months for a refund. The subscription costs 5,900 won ($4.04) per month and can be paid through Samsung Card.

articles.title: TikTok Refugees Flock to Dorian to Make Their Videos Interactive
articles.author: Dorian Inc
articles.summary: Dorian launched a beta version of its video product, which helps integrate video and audio into games. The product aims to provide a platform for video creators, particularly those affected by the TikTok ban, to preserve and monetize their content.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Tab A9 price is one of the cheapest we've seen for a while
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Reviewers praise the Samsung tablet's performance, noting occasional lag but overall satisfaction. Users have expressed concerns about the tablet's battery life, with some reporting it drains quickly even in standby mode.

articles.title: Nuvei expands Omnichannel capabilities to the UK Gaming industry
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nuvei's Omnichannel architecture offers a unified platform for all retail and digital transactions. The architecture simplifies operations and enhances customer experience.

articles.title: D2C lingerie brand Krvvy raises pre-seed from Titan Capital and All In Capital
articles.author: Metla Sudha Sekhar
articles.summary: Krvvy, a functional innerwear brand, has secured Rs 6.1 crore in pre-seed funding to expand its product range and introduce innovative functional innerwear to the Indian market. The company plans to allocate the funding to research and development and aims to expand its online and offline presence nationwide.

articles.title: Waza launches Lync to empower African startups with cross-border payment solutions
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: Waza launched Lync, a new product designed for African startups. Lync offers multi-currency accounts and facilitates affordable cross-border payments.

articles.title: What the Aaliyah Barbie Doll Means to Black Girls
articles.author: Naomi Parris
articles.summary: Mattel released a new Barbie doll on January 16 honoring the late R&B princess, Aaliyah. This launch represents a new version of the iconic Barbie toy line by Mattel.

articles.title: Kia continues trend of outdated models with 5th-generation Sportage launch
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: Kia, managed by Lucky Motors, will launch the 5th-generation Sportage in Pakistan by February 2025. The model being introduced is the pre-facelift version, featuring petrol and hybrid options with specific engine specifications. Official specifications and pricing will be revealed closer to the launch date.

articles.title: 【YILI Olfactory Art】南國南國 (Southland) #2086－香水評論報台 Chris Perfume Reviews｜痞客邦
articles.author: 香水評論報台 Chris Perfume Reviews
articles.summary: Yili Olfactory Art launched a new perfume in 2024 created by perfumer Yili Li. The perfume features top notes of acacia, mango leaf, and angelica; middle notes of frangipani, tuberose, narcissus, and boronia; and base notes of musk, lichen, and ambergris. The scent is described as a retro fragrance with a classic feel, reminiscent of old aldehyde perfumes.

articles.title: AI-powered smartphones gain popularity in Vietnam ahead of Tet celebrations
articles.author: Bao Anh
articles.summary: Several smartphone companies are introducing new AI-powered features to enhance user experience. Apple's iPhone 16 includes Apple Intelligence with smart subject removal, Oppo's Find X8 series features generative AI for enhanced photos, Xiaomi's Redmi Note 14 Pro includes AI camera tools, and Honor's X9c series introduces Magic Capsule for multitasking. Oppo's Reno13 series uses AI for photo-to-video conversion and includes Vietnamese AI tools.

articles.title: Keep Warm with ALDI Ireland's €29.99 Sleep Game-Changer Heated Blanket
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched heated blankets for €29.99, featuring nine temperature settings, micro fleece material, automatic shut-off, and overheat protection. These blankets are available in Dark Gray, Light Gray, and Cream. ALDI's previous product launch of the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner for €49.99 became a must-have item and is cited as evidence of the retailer's ability to provide affordable and high-quality products.

articles.title: French Tech shines at Retail's Big Show
articles.author: David Johnson
articles.summary: KBRW showcased its Order Management System, touted as a highly efficient solution for managing supply chain complexity. Smartway presented its AI-powered solution to reduce food waste by up to 30% while improving retailer margins. TrustPlace introduced its digital ownership certificates, enabling brands to establish direct connections with consumers.

articles.title: The meteor redefining the boundaries of advertising
articles.author: Tal Jacobson
articles.summary: AI is revolutionizing advertising by enhancing context-based advertising, personalizing ads, and automating creative optimization. Brands can leverage AI to improve customer experiences, forecast campaigns, and unify platforms for targeted campaigns and improved ROI. These AI-powered tools are already enabling advertisers to be more creative and effective.

articles.title: Why Agentic AI Will Soon Make ChatGPT Look Like A Simple Calculator
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced scheduled tasks in ChatGPT, marking an early step towards agentic AI. The company is also rumored to be developing projects like "Operator" and "Caterpillar," aimed at enabling more autonomous AI agents capable of controlling computers independently and proactively searching for information. These projects suggest OpenAI's broader ambitions for more autonomous AI systems.

articles.title: Best Kindle deal: Prime members can save $50 on the Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition
articles.author: Hannah Hoolihan
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition (32GB) for $229.99 to Amazon Prime members, which is 18% off the list price. The Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition is a new e-reader enabling color viewing of novels and comics.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Here's what is expected to launch at the event
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 series smartphones at its Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025. The series is expected to include the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, featuring advanced AI technology and upgraded specifications such as potentially a 200MP primary camera for the Ultra variant. Pre-reservations for the new smartphones have already begun in India.

articles.title: 20 Target Products You Need If You Want A Cleaner, More Organized Home In 2025
articles.author: Brock Pirtle
articles.summary: Target is offering a range of new products including a utility cart, drawer organizers, cleaning paste (Pink Stuff), jewelry organizer, wire drawer organizer, reed oil diffuser, steam mop, cleaning concentrate (Grove Co.), power spin scrubber, wet and dry sweeper (Swiffer), bamboo organizer, toilet wand (Clorox), cleaning paste and sponge (Scrub Daddy), carpet cleaner (Bissel), toilet cleaners (Scrubbing Bubbles), linen spray, extendable scrubber, bathroom etagere, spin mop (O-Cedar), and door mat.

articles.title: How Nothing has scored over likes of bigger brands like Samsung with its Android 15 update
articles.author: Vivek Umashankar
articles.summary: Nothing has launched Android 15-based Nothing OS 3 for its devices, including Nothing Phone (1), Nothing Phone (2), Nothing Phone (2a), Nothing Phone (2a) Plus and CMF Phone (1). This update introduces new features, enhancements, and AI capabilities such as 'Circle to Search', along with a revamped quick settings menu and customizable lock screen.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 scheduled for January 22: How to watch livestream and what to expect
articles.author: India Today Tech
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil its Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, with expectations of advanced AI-powered features and a possible new model, the Galaxy S25 Slim. The series is rumored to feature upgrades in display, camera technology, battery performance, and integration of Google's Gemini AI assistant. Customers can pre-book the Galaxy Pre-reserve VIP Pass for benefits and a chance to win prizes.

articles.title: TheGtrendz Unveils Revamped Website to Provide Comprehensive Tips, Features on Healthy Lifestyles
articles.summary: TheGtrendz, a digital platform, has launched its redesigned website featuring an intuitive layout and enhanced navigation. The updated platform includes new content categories focused on wellness, lifestyle strategies, and emerging trends, aiming to provide a streamlined user experience and accessible content for balanced and healthy living. The revamped website offers responsive design, enhanced search functionality, and an organized layout.

articles.title: When AI Meets Metal: How the Marriage of AI & Robotics Will Change the World
articles.author: Satyen K Bordoloi
articles.summary: Xiaomi and Samsung are introducing home assistant robots for household tasks. FANUC and ABB are creating collaborative robots for factories to improve production and safety. Intuitive Surgical is upgrading its da Vinci system with AI for precise surgeries, while Sony and Toyota are teaming up to develop care robots for elderly support.

articles.title: Kim Yew Integrated Celebrates 40 Years With $68,000 Donation To The
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Galaxy Macau and Guojiao 1573 have partnered to launch the 'Auspicious Snake · Guojiao 1573 Tasting Festival' pop-up store in Macau. The store features the debut of two new baijiu products: 'Guojiao 1573 · Auspicious Spirit Snake' and 'Luzhou Laojiao · 2025 Year of the Yi Si Lunar New Year Gift Baijiu,' both exclusive offerings featuring fine porcelain bottles.

articles.title: 65 Weird New Things on Amazon That Are So Damn Clever
articles.author: Christina Wood
articles.summary: The article showcases several new and innovative products, including mushroom night lights, laser star projectors, syrup dispensers, and car seat gap organizers. These products aim to solve everyday problems and improve convenience in various aspects of life, like home decor, organization, and cooking.

articles.title: Instagram debuts new video-editing app, as TikTok deals with a ban
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: A new video-editing app, 'Edits,' has been introduced. This app is described as a clone of the existing app, CapCut.

articles.title: From phones to speakers, here are my 6 favorite Google products
articles.author: Chris Wedel
articles.summary: Google is approaching the 10-year anniversary of its Pixel phones. Google released the original Pixel Watch in 2022, and has since released a Pixel Watch 3 with two sizes and longer battery life. Other Google products include the new Google TV Streamer and Google TV with Chromecast, and the Google Pixelbook.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 rumours: Slim model may be delayed
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Samsung might tease the Galaxy S25 Slim smartphone at the end of the Galaxy Unpacked event.

articles.title: Robert & John Limited to Launch groundbreaking MVNO called Liv.ing. XIUS to provide robust Business Support System (BSS) that will enable Liv.ing retail the essentials of life
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Robert & John is launching its Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO), Liv.ing, with system support from XIUS. Liv.ing aims to provide a new approach to mobile connectivity.

articles.title: Every Samsung Galaxy S25 rumour you need to know
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Samsung might tease the new Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim smartphone at the end of the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. This suggests a potential future introduction of the new product.

articles.title: Over 90 New Products Launched In First Two Days Of Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: At Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025, 22 different brands launched 56 new products. The event took place at Bharat Mandapam in Pragati.

articles.title: Every Samsung Galaxy S25 rumour you need to know, as release date nears
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Samsung may tease the new Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim smartphone at the end of Galaxy Unpacked. This suggests a potential future introduction or launch of this device.

articles.title: 10 must-have beauty products for a radiant glow and confidence this season
articles.author: Team Indulge
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new beauty products. The Body Shop launched Lotus Body Mist, Dusky India introduced Aloe Vera Face Gel, Kimirica launched Sweet Almond Oil, and POND'S released Youthful Miracle with Hexyl-Retinol Technology. M.A.C launched M.A.C.ximal Sleek Satin Lipstick, Brillare introduced Zinc Compact Powder, Revlon launched Super Lustrous The Gloss, Skinvest launched Face Hug Barrier Repair Moisturizer, and Dromen & Co. introduced Castor Brew Oil.
